title: Land transport and transport via pipelines (PKD 49)
paragraphs: General category covering wider land transport activities beyond the main code 49.41.Z.
Possibility to extend services in the future to other land-based transport segments.
The company focuses on safe and efficient movement of goods across Europe and neighbouring regions.
points: Planning of land transport chains using road and, where possible, intermodal solutions.
Flexibility to add new types of land transport services when required by clients.
Long-term goal: building a strong and reliable land transport network between Europe and the Middle East.
